channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Honda and Mercedes-Benz declare war on potholes – new LiDAR and suspension tricks aim to soften the blow of government failures
item.description: Honda harnesses its sensor tech to spy on potholes for the government, which could help to fix busted roads.

item.title: Oh dear - the recent TikTok outage was due to an Oracle data center going down
item.description: Severe winter weather caused a power outage at an Oracle data center, knocking many TikTok features offline for days.

item.title: I tested the Oukitel Industry RT10 - this rugged tablet is packed with features, but it's a shame you need a specialist app for the built-in barcode scanner
item.description: The Oukitel Industry RT10 is a business-focused rugged tablet with an 11" FHD touchscreen, 5G connectivity, and storage expansion, and what's more, it's built tough to withstand the elements.

item.title: Steven Spielberg Lands EGOT Status With New Grammy Win
item.description: After decades of films and accolades, Steven Spielberg hit the grand slam after his now award-winning documentary focused on John Williams.

item.title: Amazfit smartwatches just got two new features that make them even better value
item.description: Amazfit smartwatches now work with the Runna app and have a fresh interface design.

item.title: 3 Best Floodlight Security Cameras (2026), Tested and Reviewed
item.description: Light up and secure your driveway, backyard, or porch with a floodlight security camera.

item.title: Vivo and Oppo’s telephoto extender comes to iPhone
item.description: PGYTech, the accessory manufacturer behind the official telephoto extender lenses for recent Vivo and Oppo flagships, has launched a Kickstarter for a new version developed for iPhones. The RetroVa Vintage Imaging Kit looks an awful lot like the camera kits for those phones, complete with a custom case, slide-on camera grip with built-in battery and […]...

item.title: IKEA Valentine's Day trends 2026: feel the love with cute kitchen tech and accessories from $1
item.description: Treat your sweetheart to a special breakfast with these pretty and affordable kitchen must-haves.

item.title: Avengers: Doomsday and Spider-Man: Brand New Day trailers won't air during Super Bowl 2026, new report says — and Marvel fans can't understand why
item.description: A new Marvel report has cast doubt on the next Avengers and Spider-Man film trailers making their debuts at this year's Super Bowl.

item.title: Enfin de retour en promo, ce purificateur d’air Dyson 3-en-1 est 100 € moins cher
item.description: Il purifie toute l'année, chauffe l'hiver et ventile l'été : le Dyson Hot+Cool HP1 est un appareil polyvalent qui s'adapte à chaque saison. En cette fin de soldes d'hiver 2026, Dyson et Boulanger l'affichent en plus à 499 euros au lieu de 599 euros.

item.title: How to watch Silent Witness season 29 online – stream Emilia Fox detective drama for free
item.description: Birmingham hosts the next chapter of this popular forensic crime drama. Here’s how you can watch Silent Witness season 29 online and from anywhere.

item.title: 'I'll believe it when I see it': Windows 11 users are cynical about Microsoft's promises to fix the OS and stop pushing AI
item.description: Microsoft appears to finally be listening to users calling for fundamental changes with Windows 11.

item.title: Two new affordable DJI drones have leaked – and it looks like they might even escape the US ban
item.description: It seems that DJI is preparing successors to the DJI Mini 4K and the DJI Mini 5 Pro, and they could be here soon.

item.title: I tested the HP OmniBook 7 and I don’t think there’s a better mid-range laptop — but it’s not exactly cheap
item.description: The HP OmniBook 7 14-inch promises to be a strong mid-range effort — but can it live up to the price tag?

item.title: India offers foreign cloud providers zero taxes until 2047 - but only if their data runs through Indian data centers
item.description: International cloud services running through Indian data centers won't be taxed until 2047 as part of a huge investment in India's development.

item.title: The 20 Best Sexy Gifts for Lovers (2026)
item.description: Spice things up with our favorite sex toys, date-night boxes, and lingerie for every type of couple.

item.title: The 2026 Super Bowl May Be Free of Superhero Movies
item.description: If you're hoping to see 'Avengers: Doomsday' or 'Supergirl' at the Super Bowl, you might've already lost the game.

item.title: Why most corporate and tech chiefs are saying the bare minimum about events in Minneapolis
item.description: CEO silence about Minneapolis, one leader says, ‘isn’t neutral. It’s expensive. Letting this chaos continue is fiscal malpractice.’ Hello and welcome to Modern CEO! I’m Stephanie Mehta, CEO and chief content officer of Mansueto Ventures. Each week this newsletter explores inclusive approaches to leadership drawn from conversations with executives and entrepreneurs, and from the pages of Inc. and Fast Company. If you received this newsletter from a friend, you can sign up to get it yourself every Monday morning....

item.title: How to stay ‘in the zone’ all day
item.description: Expert advice on maintaining your mental edge. Staying focused for an entire workday can feel like a losing battle. Between constant notifications, shifting priorities, and mental fatigue, even the most disciplined professionals struggle to maintain momentum from morning to evening. To understand what actually helps people stay in the zone, we turned to experts who study attention, performance, and productivity. They shared nine practical, research-backed strategies for sustaining deep focus and getting meaningful work done throughout the day....

item.title: Ces étranges arcs rouges dans le ciel n’étaient pas des aurores
item.description: Une illusion d’optique. L’œuvre d’une intelligence artificielle. Une aurore boréale pas comme les autres. Ou rien de tout ça. Vous avez peut-être été étonné par ces photos d’arcs rouges illuminant le ciel lors de la tempête solaire d’il y a quelques jours. Mais les chercheurs ont une explication.

item.title: TikTok says it's 'back to normal' after winter storm-related outages
item.description: TikTok is finally "back to normal" in the US after days of technical issues and outages tied to winter storms. Less than a week after companies like Oracle took ownership of TikTok's domestic operations, the platform faced a major power outage when one of its primary US data center sites — run by Oracle — got taken down by the storm. The problems started last Monday, January 26, when TikTok announced it was working on a "major infrastructure issue" and warned of bugs, time-out requests, missing earnings, and more. The next day TikTok shared that progress has been made but there were still som...

item.title: « Une question de survie » : les voitures électriques et hybrides chinoises viennent de franchir un cap historique en Europe
item.description: On en parlait comme d'un risque lointain, c'est désormais une réalité statistique. En ce début d'année 2026, les constructeurs chinois ne se contentent plus de faire de la figuration en Europe. Ils s'imposent durablement, notamment grâce à une stratégie agressive sur l'hybride.

item.title: Snap up a Dreo Electric Heater with over 3,000 five-star reviews for under £40 at Amazon
item.description: Dreo makes some fantastic heaters and this model is just £40 at Amazon right now.

item.title: Super Bowl 2026 deals: Score free food from Applebees, Buffalo Wild Wings, Denny’s, and more
item.description: The best Super Bowl 2026 free food deals. How to get free food from Applebee's, Buffalo Wild Wings, Denny’s, Fazoli’s, and more.

item.title: Amazon has slashed over $100 off the Sonos Sub 4 for a limited time
item.description: As of Feb. 2, the Sonos Sub 4 is on sale at Amazon for $759 for a limited time, 16% off its list price of $899.

item.title: iPhone users are getting a new feature to protect their privacy in iOS 26.3 – here’s how it works
item.description: The iOS 26.3 update includes a new Limit Precise Location feature designed to protect your privacy.

item.title: This touchscreen controller patent from Sony could hint at a future leap forward for accessibility — 'There exists a desire for game controllers to allow for different configurations'
item.description: Sony's touchscreen controller patent could be used to combat the "drawbacks" of fixed button and stick configurations.

item.title: Le Sony Xperia 10 VII voit son prix chuter sur Amazon, et ça le rend bien plus intéressant
item.description: En promotion à 399 euros au lieu de 449 euros, le Sony Xperia 10 VII devient enfin un milieu de gamme bien placé niveau tarif, d’autant qu’il aligne désormais un écran OLED 120 Hz, un nouveau design plus moderne et une autonomie confortable.

item.title: Gemini prépare un outil pour quitter ChatGPT sans perdre vos conversations
item.description: Migrer vos conversations de ChatGPT vers Google Gemini est pour l’instant impossible, mais Google semble préparer un outil pour transférer facilement votre historique.

item.title: I let a robot do my manicure at Ulta
item.description: As AI moves into the physical world, Ulta’s robot manicurist offers a glimpse of what’s next. In my suburban Boston Ulta, I’m sitting with my hand in a little box. I’ve been promised that in roughly 30 minutes I’ll have nails that are shaped, buffed, and painted—not by a human, but by an AI-powered robot.

item.title: Olivia Dean celebrates immigrants in moving Grammys speech
item.description: Olivia Dean just won her very first Grammy, taking home Best New Artist at Sunday's ceremony.

item.title: Voiture électrique : cette nouvelle batterie chinoise peut se réparer toute seule avec une durée de vie d’1,8 millions de kilomètres
item.description: Le géant chinois CATL vient de dévoiler une nouvelle batterie totalement révolutionnaire. Cette dernière affiche une durée de vie de 1,8 million de kilomètres et permet une charge ultra-rapide. Mais ce n’est pas tout.

item.title: Sony et Bose ont du souci à se faire, Nothing va lancer un casque à prix cassé
item.description: Nothing préparerait la sortie du Headphone (a). Ce casque audio se voudrait plus abordable et pourrait débarquer dès le mois de mars à un tarif défiant toute concurrence.

item.title: 'A bulldozer named Broadcom' hits cloud service providers after another major blow against VMware partners
item.description: Only 19 VCSPs now remain in the US - and a similar wipeout is happening in Europe as Broadcom pulls major VMware partner program.

item.title: Bad Bunny slams ICE during Grammys speech
item.description: Bad Bunny addressed ICE during his acceptance speech for Best Música Urbana Album at the 2026 Grammy Awards.

item.title: Motorola se moque de l’Europe avec ce smartphone à zéro mise à jour
item.description: Depuis le règlement du 20 juin 2025, on pouvait penser que l’Europe avait trouvé la parade pour forcer les fabricants de smartphones à assurer cinq ans de mises à jour logicielles. Mais moins d’un an après l’entrée en vigueur du texte, Motorola démontre qu'il est possible de contourner le règlement. Ses nouveaux modèles d’entrée de gamme ne proposeront aucune mise à jour majeure… sans pour autant enfreindre la loi a priori....

item.title: JO d’hiver 2026 en streaming : où, quand et comment regarder les directs et les replays des épreuves de Milano Cortina
item.description: On a encore l'impression que les Jeux Olympiques et Paralympiques de Paris étaient hier, alors qu'il faut déjà passer à autre chose. Cette semaine aura lieu la cérémonie d'ouverture des JO d'hiver de Milano Cortina, voici tout ce qu'il faut savoir pour suivre cette nouvelle quinzaine sportive dans la poudreuse italienne.
